Changelog
=========

0.1.0 (2016-02-15)
------------------

* various additions to documentation
* clean package
* first prototype release on Pypi


0.0.3 (2016-01-05)
------------------

* dynamically create changelog
* add option hooks
* add version option
  

0.0.2 (2015-12-25)
------------------

* add documentation
* package as wheel
  

0.0.1 (2015-12-24)
------------------

* initial release
